info.title: Loans
info.description: Ability to define and manage customer credit policies and capabilities specifically for customer financing / leasing of related purchases.

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: The Access-Control-Allow-Headers header indicates, as part of a pre-flight request which headers can be used on the actual request.

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: The Access-Control-Allow-Methods header indicates, as part of a pre-flight request which methods can be used on the actual request.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: The Access-Control-Allow-Origin header indicates whether a resource can be shared by returning the value of the Origin request header or “*” in the response.

Content-Length.description: The Content-Length header specifies the actual length of the returned payload.

Content-Type.description: The Content-Length header specifies the actual length of the returned payload.

ETag.description: The ETag header specifies the unique entity tag value for the returned resource.

Expires.description: The Expires header gives the date-time after which the response is considered stale.

Location.description: The Location header specifies the URI of a created resource, or redirects the API consumer to an alternate resource location.

servicetransactionid.description: Internal identifier for transaction tracking an individual transaction/API request within API platform. Don’t receive/don’t send to downstream

universalLineId.description: ULID - Universal identifier of the LineofService, as defined in Customer Hub.

accountType.description: Type or classification of the account.

accountNumber.description: The financial account number that identifies the account.

status.description: The current status of the account.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last date and time when the account was modified.

billCycleDay.description: Day of the month when bill cycle normally runs.

paymentDueDay.description: Day of month on which the payment is due.

eipIndicator.description: To indicate if the line of service has EIP (Equipment Installment Plan).

daysInCurrentAccount.description: Number of days that the line has been associated with the current account. If still associated with the original account, this will have the same value as the daysSinceActivation.

zip.description: The 5 digit zip or postal delivery code.

documentId.description: Identifies the document in the document storage system.

eligibilityType.description: The type of eligibility being established.

imei.description: International Mobile Equipment Identifier.  Unique identifier for a mobile device on a network.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the equipment (device or accessory).

sku.description: The sku of the device offer variant.  Only relevant if the customer purchased the device from T-Mobile.

productType.description: The category of product included in the offer: Plan, Service, Device, Accessory, or Financial.

productSubType.description: Secondary categorizations of the type of product included in the offer.

salePrice.description: Actual price customer paid for the equipment

totalDownpaymentAmount.description: Down payment plus additional down payments minus discount

paymentTransactionId.description: A value assigned by the merchant to uniquely reference a transaction and any subsequent related transactions

timePaymentProcessed.description: The time the payment was made

paymentMethodCode.description: Code identifying the current payment method specified for the payment instrument, such as Cash/Credit.

paymentTransactionType.description: Type of transaction, such as Balance/Reversal/Void

pendingStatus.description: Status of pending financial transaction, possible values:  INPROCESS, COMPLETE, ERROR.

workFlowConditions.description: Describes workflow steps that have been completed or awaiting completion such as BalanceTransferComplete,shipmentPending.

loanInvoiceId.description: Identifier to uniquely idehntify a charge on a loan,  generated by the loan system.  Called the statementId in the loan system.

invoiceItemId.description: Alternate identifier for the loanInvoiceId in the billing system

loanChargeId.description: Identifier of charge generated in the loan system.

accountNumber.description: The financial account number that identifies the account.

status.description: The current status of the account.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last date and time when the account was modified.

equipmentCreditUsed.description: The amount of equipment financing for the account with all active loan/lease current balance amounts, plus any reserved loan/lease amounts. Also known as the ECLB

equipmentCreditLimit.description: Equipment Credit Limit when the account is active

equipmentCreditAvailableAmount.description: The available equipment credit amount. It is the credit limit minus the credit used.

transactionType.description: Indicate what was done such as Loan created,loan voided.

channelId.description: Identifier for the channel, such as WEB, CARE, RETAIL etc.

oldLoanId.description: The loan id of a related loan, such as for a change of responsibility or exercising a JUMP option on an existing loan.  For example in change of responsibilityfor an existing loan, a new loan is created and the existing loan balance moved to the new loan.  The existing loan is then closed.  The new loans oldLoanId is populated with the closed loanId.

currentLoanSystem.description: System of record where loan currently resides - EIP/OFSLL

last4CardNumber.description: Last four digits of the card used for payment

typeCode.description: Type of payment Card. Examples are Visa, MasterCard, Debit etc

universalLineId.description: ULID - Universal identifier of the LineofService, as defined in Customer Hub.

fulfillmentType.description: Describes whether the equipment was purchased in a retail store or shipped to the customer.

transactionType.description: Type of transaction,  e.g. Activation, Add A Line, Upgrade etc.

returnAuthorizationType.description: Return authorization type, such as JUMP, JOD, COR

additionalDownPaymentAmount.description: Additional down payment amount paid along with base down payment amount.

downPaymentDiscountAmount.description: An amount of discount that is to be subtracted from the base down payment

totalDownPaymentAmount.description: Down payment plus additional down payments minus discount

paymentSchedule.description: Schedule of payments for the loan/lease.

financingModelType.description: The type of financing model used for loan origination.  Agency or Webbank.

originatingMasterDealerCode.description: Master Dealer Code for the dealer who originally created the financing program..

originatingSalesChannel.description: Sales channel that originally created the financing program.

submissionStatus.description: Status of the loan order such as Submitted,Completed,Error

pendingFinancialTransactionStatus.description: Status of all pending financial transactions. It can be INPROCESS, COMPLETE, ERROR.

workFlowConditions.description: Describes workflow steps that have been completed or awaiting completion such as BalanceTransferComplete,shipmentPending.

agreementNumber.description: Unique Identifier for the transaction where customer agrees to the Loan/Lease.

clientWorkFlowType.description: Used only by TOM/CCO. Indicates which workflow to be followed for the loan.

tradeInEligibility.description: To indicate if device/accessory on the loan can be used for tradeIn credit.

delayPayIndicator.description: Indicates if the pay can be delayed, applies to financing plan

orderLocationState.description: State where store is located and where purchase of this loan/lease is carried out - in case of Retail Channel

orderLocationCity.description: City where store is located and where purchase of this loan/lease is carried out - in case of Retail Channel

programType.description: program type associated with the order, such as JUMP, JUMP2, JOD

sourceTransactionId.description: Unique Transaction Id from frontend applications

sourceSubTransactionId.description: Internal line Id created by ordering system NOT displayed to frontends for scenarios such as SHIP-TO

description.description: Brief description of the shipping option, eg: UPS Ground (5-7 business days)

serviceLevelCode.description: Shipping carrier priority code such as 2nd day, next day, priority, etc.

waiverIndicator.description: To indicate if shipping charges can be waived by client, or if shaiiping charge is waived in actual order.

taxExemptionIndicator.description: To indicate if tax can be exempted for the shipping charges when overall tax is calculated, or to indicate if shipping tax is exempted in actual order.

oldLoanId.description: The loan id of a related loan, such as for a change of responsibility or exercising a JUMP option on an existing loan.  For example in change of responsibilityfor an existing loan, a new loan is created and the existing loan balance moved to the new loan.  The existing loan is then closed.  The new loans oldLoanId is populated with the closed loanId.

currentLoanSystem.description: System of record where loan currently resides - EIP/OFSLL

fulfillmentType.description: Describes whether the equipment was purchased in a retail store or shipped to the customer.

transactionType.description: Type of transaction,  e.g. Activation, Add A Line, Upgrade etc.

returnAuthorizationType.description: Return authorization type, such as JUMP, JOD, COR

additionalDownPaymentAmount.description: Additional down payment amount paid along with base down payment amount.

downPaymentDiscountAmount.description: An amount of discount that is to be subtracted from the base down payment

totalDownPaymentAmount.description: Down payment plus additional down payments minus discount

paymentSchedule.description: Schedule of payments for the loan/lease.

financingModelType.description: The type of financing model used for loan origination.  Agency or Webbank.

originatingMasterDealerCode.description: Master Dealer Code for the dealer who originally created the financing program..

originatingSalesChannel.description: Sales channel that originally created the financing program.

submissionStatus.description: Status of the loan order such as Submitted,Completed,Error

pendingFinancialTransactionStatus.description: Status of all pending financial transactions. It can be INPROCESS, COMPLETE, ERROR.

workFlowConditions.description: Describes workflow steps that have been completed or awaiting completion such as BalanceTransferComplete,shipmentPending.

agreementNumber.description: Unique Identifier for the transaction where customer agrees to the Loan/Lease.

clientWorkFlowType.description: Used only by TOM/CCO. Indicates which workflow to be followed for the loan.

tradeInEligibility.description: To indicate if device/accessory on the loan can be used for tradeIn credit.

delayPayIndicator.description: Indicates if the pay can be delayed, applies to financing plan

orderLocationState.description: State where store is located and where purchase of this loan/lease is carried out - in case of Retail Channel

orderLocationCity.description: City where store is located and where purchase of this loan/lease is carried out - in case of Retail Channel

programType.description: program type associated with the order, such as JUMP, JUMP2, JOD

sourceTransactionId.description: Unique Transaction Id from frontend applications

sourceSubTransactionId.description: Internal line Id created by ordering system NOT displayed to frontends for scenarios such as SHIP-TO

description.description: Brief description of the shipping option, eg: UPS Ground (5-7 business days)

serviceLevelCode.description: Shipping carrier priority code such as 2nd day, next day, priority, etc.

waiverIndicator.description: To indicate if shipping charges can be waived by client, or if shaiiping charge is waived in actual order.

taxExemptionIndicator.description: To indicate if tax can be exempted for the shipping charges when overall tax is calculated, or to indicate if shipping tax is exempted in actual order.

accountType.description: Type or classification of the account.

accountNumber.description: The financial account number that identifies the account.

status.description: The current status of the account.

lastUpdateTime.description: Last date and time when the account was modified.

billCycleDay.description: Day of the month when bill cycle normally runs.

paymentDueDay.description: Day of month on which the payment is due.

eipIndicator.description: To indicate if the line of service has EIP (Equipment Installment Plan).

daysInCurrentAccount.description: Number of days that the line has been associated with the current account. If still associated with the original account, this will have the same value as the daysSinceActivation.

universalLineId.description: ULID - Universal identifier of the LineofService, as defined in Customer Hub.

currentPageItem.description: Number of items in this page

paymentTransactionId.description: A value assigned by the merchant to uniquely reference a transaction and any subsequent related transactions

chargeAmount.description: The total amount of the transaction inclusive of all additional amounts.

sourceId.description: To identify where the payment is originated from.

creationTime.description: Time when the Payment request was created.

last4CardNumber.description: Last four digits of the card used for payment

typeCode.description: Type of payment Card. Examples are Visa, MasterCard, Debit etc

paymentDueDate.description: Due date of payment in a month

installmentNumber.description: Installment number of the scheduled payment

oldLoanId.description: The loan id of a related loan, such as for a change of responsibility or exercising a JUMP option on an existing loan.  For example in change of responsibilityfor an existing loan, a new loan is created and the existing loan balance moved to the new loan.  The existing loan is then closed.  The new loans oldLoanId is populated with the closed loanId.

currentLoanSystem.description: System of record where loan currently resides - EIP/OFSLL

zip.description: The 5 digit zip or postal delivery code.

promotionId.description: The unique id of the promotion.

imei.description: International Mobile Equipment Identifier.  Unique identifier for a mobile device on a network.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the equipment (device or accessory).

sku.description: The sku of the device offer variant.  Only relevant if the customer purchased the device from T-Mobile.

productType.description: The category of product included in the offer: Plan, Service, Device, Accessory, or Financial.

productSubType.description: Secondary categorizations of the type of product included in the offer.

salePrice.description: Actual price customer paid for the equipment

responseError.description: Used to pass error information in a response.

userMessage.description: Use to pass human friendly information to the user.

imei.description: International Mobile Equipment Identifier.  Unique identifier for a mobile device on a network.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the equipment (device or accessory).

sku.description: The sku of the device offer variant.  Only relevant if the customer purchased the device from T-Mobile.

deviceRecoveryType.description: When the trade in equipment is expected to be returned in the context of a transaction.  Accept if the equipment is returned during the transaction, Deferred if the equipment is returned after the transaction, Accept-Deferred if no equipment is required to be returned during the transaction.

tradeInAmount.description: Amount applied from a Device traded in by Customer.

oldLoanId.description: The loan id of a related loan, such as for a change of responsibility or exercising a JUMP option on an existing loan.  For example in change of responsibilityfor an existing loan, a new loan is created and the existing loan balance moved to the new loan.  The existing loan is then closed.  The new loans oldLoanId is populated with the closed loanId.

currentLoanSystem.description: System of record where loan currently resides - EIP/OFSLL

universalLineId.description: ULID - Universal identifier of the LineofService, as defined in Customer Hub.

paymentDueDate.description: Due date of payment in a month

installmentNumber.description: Installment number of the scheduled payment
